医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，与其他抗糖尿病药物相比，索马鲁肽在 12 个月内出现不良神经精神结果的风险并不更高研究人员使用倾向评分匹配队列评估了 2 型糖尿病患者使用索马鲁肽 12 个月的神经和精神结局。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Semaglutide-shows-no-higher-12-month-risk-of-adverse-neuropsychiatric-outcomes-than-other-antidiabetic-drugs-study-suggests。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Semaglutide-shows-no-higher-12-month-risk-of-adverse-neuropsychiatric-outcomes-than-other-antidiabetic-drugs-study-suggests。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=057063b0-6833-416f-adea-6f8186656699 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 05:58:00 -0400 Semaglutide shows no higher 12-month risk of adverse neuropsychiatric outcomes than other antidiabetic drugs, study suggests
通过晚上锻炼来打破久坐的习惯，可将睡眠时间提高近 30 分钟与长时间坐着相比，晚上休息 3 分钟的阻力运动可以提高睡眠数量和质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Interrupting-sitting-with-evening-exercise-boosts-sleep-by-nearly-30-minutes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Interrupting-sitting-with-evening-exercise-boosts-sleep-by-nearly-30-minutes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06c3bebf-0a51-4076-9d92-be62615ba931 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 05:36:00 -0400 Interrupting sitting with evening exercise boosts sleep by nearly 30 minutes
新研究显示，活跃的通勤者患心脏病和癌症的可能性较小行人和骑自行车通勤对健康的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-less-likely-to-suffer-from-heart-disease-and-cancer-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-less-likely-to-suffer-from-heart-disease-and-cancer-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c41fa47-bf10-46c6-bbdc-b29af7eb4b25 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Active commuters less likely to suffer from heart disease and cancer, new research shows
橄榄球运动员的脑震荡史与较高水平的神经退行性疾病生物标志物有关一项新的研究表明，遭受过多次脑震荡的退役橄榄球运动员血液中某些蛋白质的含量较高，这可能使他们更容易患上运动神经元疾病（MND）等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Concussion-history-in-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-levels-of-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Concussion-history-in-rugby-players-linked-to-higher-levels-of-neurodogenic-disease-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b024a70-1c26-42a4-9a78-32dd0febf6ba Wed, 17 Jul 2024 03:35:56 -0400 Concussion history in rugby players linked to higher levels of neurodegenerative disease biomarkers
研究发现，夜间阻力运动“活动休息”可能会延长睡眠时间开放获取期刊《BMJ 开放运动与运动医学》上发表的一项小型比较研究的结果表明，夜间进行抗阻运动“活动休息”可能会延长睡眠时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Nighttime-resistance-exercise-activity-breaks-may-boost-sleep-duration-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Nighttime-resistance-exercise-activity-breaks-may-boost-sleep-duration-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4cf1c21-4e7b-46e7-ac3f-275242bdbd80 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 02:31:46 -0400 Nighttime resistance exercise 'activity breaks' may boost sleep duration, study finds
新研究证实，自闭症儿童的兄弟姐妹面临着更高的自闭症风险自闭症儿童的兄弟姐妹有 20% 的机会自己也患有自闭症 -；大约是没有自闭兄弟姐妹的婴儿的七倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Siblings-of-autistic-children-face-increased-autism-risk-new-research-confirms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Siblings-of-autistic-children-face-increased-autism-risk-new-research-confirms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaf551f9-45f6-4c1c-a784-26bf7e240381 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 02:25:00 -0400 Siblings of autistic children face increased autism risk, new research confirms
研究揭示行为障碍儿童的大脑结构差异新的研究表明，与正常发育的儿童相比，年轻人的行为障碍与大脑大部分区域的表面积差异有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-children-with-conduct-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-children-with-conduct-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbfda52d-674f-4708-8367-defe69e2ccb9 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 02:09:05 -0400 Study reveals brain structure differences in children with conduct disorder
Sapio Sciences 启动合作伙伴计划以加速研究和诊断Science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布推出 Sapio 合作伙伴计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Sapio-Sciences-launches-partner-program-to-accelerate-research-and-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Sapio-Sciences-launches-partner-program-to-accelerate-research-and-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f278f075-4b22-4cb4-9730-2586b8c7c859 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 01:29:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences launches partner program to accelerate research and diagnostics
活跃的通勤者患精神和身体健康不良的风险可能较低开放获取期刊《BMJ 公共卫生》上发表的一项大型长期研究发现，骑自行车或步行上下班或学习的通勤者患精神和身体疾病的风险可能低于那些不依赖这些选择的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-may-have-lower-risks-of-mental-and-physical-ill-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240717/Active-commuters-may-have-lower-risks-of-mental-and-physical-ill-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f2660f8-1028-4798-a7e7-cfd3f65f81b4 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 01:21:07 -0400 Active commuters may have lower risks of mental and physical ill health
您的饮食如何塑造肠道微生物组并影响您的健康《自然评论微生物学》发表的评论强调了不同饮食如何影响肠道微生物组健康，强调需要精准营养来优化健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/How-your-diet-shapes-your-gut-microbiome-and-impacts-your-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/How-your-diet-shapes-your-gut-microbiome-and-impacts-your-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=064c5094-8dc4-4a8e-8ea9-c45aa80dc864 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 23:36:00 -0400 How your diet shapes your gut microbiome and impacts your health
